imdb.title: Koi koi 7
imdb.plot: Tetsuro is the only boy at an all girl high school, there he gets into trouble with the powerful student council leadership who are in conflict with a group of schoolgirl warriors named the Koi Koi Seven which includes his friend ...

episodes.title: Kaben mankai! Koi no hana saku Koi koi 7 desu
episodes.plot: Tetsuro transfers to what turns out to be an otherwise all-girl school where he meets Yayoi, who claims to know him.

episodes.title: Gâruzu burabô! Yurete nagarete! Gyakushû no miyasama desu
episodes.plot: At school, Miya snares and ties Tetsuro suspended over the pool. He is forced to watch from this position as the girls compete for him, first swimming a medley relay, then wrestling "Mongolian-style", and finally in a volleyball game.

episodes.title: Tokusatsu gekifaiyâ! Aokiwo, kokoro no mukou ni... desu
episodes.plot: Garbed as one of her favorite cartoon heroes, Akiwo battles the nefarious Sailor-Bloomer Mask, a vacuum-equipped villain who sucks the uniforms off of unsuspecting high school girls, leaving them in their underwear.

episodes.title: Bijin hakumei!? Otome-chan wa nani o yumemiru? Desu
Gôka kenran bakunyû taikai Odaiba no sora o tsuranuite desu
episodes.plot: Miya hosts a swimsuit competition to celebrate the opening of her space elevator at Odaiba. The Koi Koi 7 girls enter because they need the 1 million yen cash prize to repair the house after it was damaged by Miyabi's hair.

episodes.title: Nekketsu tôkon Onigunsô dono! Seisaku shinkô Sakuya-san desu
episodes.plot: Sakuya has to make an anime on an impossible deadline.

episodes.title: Shirayuri arashi! Aa, Uruwashi no kimi yo Omoi harukani... desu
episodes.plot: While preparing for the school festival, Tetsuro's uniform and glasses are destroyed in a painting accident, so Yayoi dresses him up in a girl's uniform. Miya is taken by this fresh-faced newcomer, adopting "Tetsuko Nakata" as her younger sister, and insists that they exchange ribbons.

episodes.title: Megami kakusei!? Hikari to kage no Asuka Yayoi-chan desu
episodes.plot: On the day of the festival, Tetsuro is pressed into service at the class's maid cafe, being forced to cross dress again.

episodes.title: Yôjo kôrin!! Gantai-chan, hajimete no osanpo desu
episodes.plot: Gentai is bored. Feeling out of place, she wanders off without telling anyone and finds her way to the school, where various scenes trigger disturbing flashbacks.

episodes.title: Momoiro toki!? Hifumi-chan mau! Utakata no ichinichi... desu
episodes.plot: Hifumi is not acting like herself. She seems to have heard the scream of a mandoragora, and will lose all memory unless she eats the mandrake root raw.

episodes.title: Shuchi nikurin!? Miya-sama sakuretsu! Suna no arashi no katoreajô desu
episodes.plot: The Koi Koi 7 fight their way through Miya's Cattleya Castle to reach Gentai.

episodes.title: Kyôten dôchi?? Sekai no chûshin de futari de issho ni nani sakebu? Desu
episodes.plot: Having decided not to disband after all, the Gokoh 5 pick one last fight with Koi Koi 7.

episodes.title: Nankoku tengoku! Zenra de tatakae! Kessenjô wa tora tora tora desu
episodes.plot: The gate to the other world is open, and it appears to be some kind of tropical paradise.
